scripts.tags: npx cypress-tags run -e TAGS='@mutilSelect' --browser chrome --headed && npm run headedLess -- --browser electron --headed
scripts.dashBoredMultiBrower: npm run dashBoardHeadeless -- --browser chrome --headed &&  npm run dashBoardHeadeless -- --browser edge --headed
scripts.multiBrowser: npm run headedLess -- --browser electron --headed  &&  npm run headedLess -- --browser edge --headed  &&  npm run headedLess -- --browser chrome --headed
scripts.multiBrowser2: npm run headedLess -- --browser electron  &&  npm run headedLess -- --browser edge  &&  npm run headedLess -- --browser chrome
scripts.cy:run_browser: npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser firefox & npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser chrome & npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser edge
scripts.cy:run_browser_group: npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser firefox  --group Firefox --ci-build-id 1   &   npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser chrome   --group Chrome --ci-build-id 1  & npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser edge  --group Edge --ci-build-id 1
